subject: Load #88882992
body:
Hi Team,


Carrier just informed us that Load #843729 is stuck at the shipper due to a mechanical issue with the trailer.

They’ve been on site since 7:45 AM CST and are waiting for road service.

ETA is now TBD.


Please advise if we need to look for a recovery option.


Thanks,

Amy S.

Dispatcher, JX Freight Solutions

amy@jxfreightsol.com

(214) 555-0092

subject: Load #999123
body:
Driver is delayed

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

subject: Load #712094 – Detention Time
body:
Hi,

Our driver arrived at the pickup location for Load #712094 at 1:15PM and
wasn’t loaded until 4:05PM. That’s almost 3 hours on site. Please confirm
if detention will be approved.

Let me know if you need BOL timestamps—we’ve got them ready.

Best,

Ashley

Carrier Relations – Lone Star Hauling
